Name: Myth of Mirka
About the game: Choose your own adventure in this visual novel about mysterious government experiments gone wrong! The story begins when your private jet crashes during a blizzard. You survive, but your wife and daughter are missing. You have no cellular signal and your body is starting to enter hypothermia. What do you do? Find your Family or Seek Shelter? These are the types of moral and ethical decisions you must answer if you want to get to the bottom of the Myth of Mirka. The game includes multiple endings and 2 areas of the storyline split randomly down a 50/50 path, providing replayability (even if you make the same choices). CONTROLS: LEFT MOUSE CLICK
